tool_description: Validates customer eligibility for loyalty program enrollment based on account status, purchase history, and geographic restrictions.

customer_id.description: Unique identifier for the customer account

program_id.description: Identifier for the specific loyalty program

minimum_purchase_amount.description: Minimum historical purchase amount required for eligibility

error_messages: Customer not found: The provided customer_id does not exist in the system. Verify the customer ID is correct.
Program not found: The provided program_id does not exist. Check available loyalty programs.
Invalid purchase amount: minimum_purchase_amount must be a non-negative number.
usage: Provide customer_id and program_id to check basic eligibility. Optionally set minimum_purchase_amount to apply purchase history requirements.

is_eligible.description: Whether the customer meets eligibility criteria

eligibility_reasons.description: List of reasons supporting or preventing eligibility

account_status.description: Current status of the customer account
